sourcesContent:
// API Configuration
export const API_URL = 'http://localhost:5000/api';

// Other configuration constants can be added here
export const APP_NAME = 'E-Commerce Admin Panel';
export const APP_VERSION = '1.0.0';

// Theme configuration
export const THEME_CONFIG = {
  light: {
    primary: '#2563EB', // Professional blue
    secondary: '#0EA5E9', // Sky blue
    accent: '#7C3AED', // Purple for highlights
    success: '#059669', // Green for success states
    warning: '#D97706', // Orange for warnings
    error: '#DC2626', // Red for errors
    background: '#F8FAFC', // Light gray background
    surface: '#FFFFFF', // White surface
    text: '#1E293B', // Dark slate for text
    textSecondary: '#64748B', // Slate for secondary text
    border: '#E2E8F0', // Light border
    shadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    hover: '#F1F5F9', // Light hover state
    buttonText: '#FFFFFF',
    card: '#FFFFFF',
    cardHover: '#F8FAFC',
    inputBackground: '#FFFFFF',
    inputBorder: '#E2E8F0',
    inputFocus: '#2563EB',
    modalBackground: 'rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.6)', // Semi-transparent dark
    modalContent: '#FFFFFF',
    tableHeader: '#F1F5F9',
    tableRow: '#FFFFFF',
    tableRowHover: '#F8FAFC',
    divider: '#E2E8F0'
  },
  dark: {
    primary: '#3B82F6', // Brighter blue for dark mode
    secondary: '#38BDF8', // Brighter sky blue
    accent: '#A78BFA', // Brighter purple
    success: '#10B981', // Brighter green
    warning: '#F59E0B', // Brighter orange
    error: '#EF4444', // Brighter red
    background: '#0F172A', // Dark blue background
    surface: '#1E293B', // Darker surface
    text: '#F8FAFC', // Light text
    textSecondary: '#94A3B8', // Muted text
    border: '#334155', // Dark border
    shadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
    hover: '#1E293B', // Dark hover state
    buttonText: '#FFFFFF',
    card: '#1E293B',
    cardHover: '#334155',
    inputBackground: '#1E293B',
    inputBorder: '#334155',
    inputFocus: '#3B82F6',
    modalBackground: 'rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.8)', // More opaque dark
    modalContent: '#1E293B',
    tableHeader: '#1E293B',
    tableRow: '#1E293B',
    tableRowHover: '#334155',
    divider: '#334155'
  }
};
